name: Natural Composability in Autonomous Worlds
description: We are in the process of building Stratagems, a game whose straightforward initial rules allow players to create the world they play in. This world can then be permissionlessly extended through the introduction of new rules, all the while maintaining the integrity of existing ones â€” an approach that allows anyone to extend the world without the need for an onchain API. This presentation will describe how this mechanism works in practice and how it might be deployed elsewhere.

speakers.name: Ronan Sandford
speakers.bio: Ronan Sandford is the founder of Etherplay, where he has been building onchain games since 2016. His latest project is Stratagems, a project exploring the latent composability in permissionless and persistent games.
